subject: Node.js
content: My current interests have lead me to further explore Node.js. Outside of the basic scripts I plan on delving further into using it for REST API development.

subject: Angular
content: I started learning Angular in early 2017 and since then we have seen four more releases! Angular is a constantly evolving framework like so many others, so the learning is never really done.

subject: Spring Framework
content: The Spring Java Framework is used heavily where I currently work so I am continuously learning about this extremely robust tool.
